landing.title: About Us
landing.description: Learn about our story, mission, and the team behind [Your Business]. Discover what makes us unique and why clients trust us for their [service] needs.

section.title: About Page
section.paragraph1: First paragraph introducing your business story, mission, and values. Explain what drives you and what makes your approach unique. Connect emotionally with your audience.
section.paragraph2: Second paragraph elaborating on your expertise, experience, or philosophy. Share what sets you apart and why clients should trust you with their wellbeing.
section.paragraph3: Third paragraph elaborating on your expertise, experience, or philosophy. Share what sets you apart and why clients should trust you with their wellbeing.
section.paragraph4: Third paragraph elaborating on your expertise, experience, or philosophy. Share what sets you apart and why clients should trust you with their wellbeing.
section.quoteText: Inspirational or meaningful quote that captures your business philosophy, mission, or approach to client care.
section.imageAlt: Descriptive alt text for about section image

team.topper: Team Section Label (e.g., Our Team, Meet The Team)
team.title: Our Expert Team Members
